name: Webapibook.github.com
body: ### Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET Welcome to the "Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET" book site, by * [Glenn Block](http://codebetter.com/glennblock/) * [Pablo Cibraro] (http://weblogs.asp.net/cibrax/) * [Pedro FÃ©lix] (http://pfelix.wordpress.com/) * [Howard Dierking] (http://codebetter.com/howarddierking/) * [Darrel Miller] (http://www.bizcoder.com/) This book is a work in progress and there still a long road ahead, however the first drafts are available at the [OFPS - O'Reilly Open Feedback Publishing System - site](http://ofps.oreilly.com/titles/9781449337711/). Comments are welcomed! Follow @webapibook
tagline: Site for the "Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET" book
